```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(rstanarm)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
nyc_clean <- read_csv("clean_data/nyc_names_vichy_complied.csv")

nyc_clean <- nyc_clean %>%
  mutate(transportation_desert_4cat = factor(transportation_desert_4cat, levels=c("Poor", "Limited", "Satisfactory", "Excellent")))
```

```{r}
model1 <- stan_polr(as.factor(transportation_desert_4cat) ~ unemployment_count + noncitizen_count + white_count, data =nyc_clean, prior=R2(0.5, what=NULL),iter=5000, seed = 86437, refresh=0)
```

```{r}
summary(model1)
```
